managementResponses.response: Thank you for staying at the Omni and for taking the time to share your feedback.  We appreciate your candor and will share it with the team.  We are happy to know that our location worked for you and we hope to see you again.  Thank you.

review.title: Omni experience
review.reviewText: Beautiful hotel, 3 blocks from China town, 15 min walk to AT&T park. Doormen not too good in giving directions around city to tourist locations

managementResponses.response: Thank you grandparents for choosing the Omni San Francisco for your week away.  We value your business and are happy to know that we will see you again.  Thank you!

review.title: Super hotel in San Francisco
review.reviewText: We had a wonderful 7 night stay. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay here again. Good location near the financial district or China town and close to good restaurants.

Nice business hotel with great staff and spacious room. Location is good, walkable to union square and Bart station, the only minus I could think of is the restuarants near the hotel were mostly closed on Sunday.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for staying at the Omni and for your candid comments regarding our hotel.  We value your constructive criticism and take the comments to heart as we strive to improve.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again.  Thank you.

review.title: Omni in need of some updating
review.reviewText: Was surprised by how tired the hallways and rugs in the room looked.  Bathroom clean and updated.  Lobby and gym fine, but hallways on floor and room overall felt a bit tired - certainly for a hotel with this high of a rating.

managementResponses.response: Thank you Steph for sharing your insiders' tips with others as it relates to your experience in our hotel and your visit to the city--especially as it relates to the weather.  Comfortable shoes and layers are keys to enjoying the city.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again.  Thank you.

review.title: Great location. Central to everything!
review.reviewText: Great lobby entrance gives nice first impression. Easy check-in at front desk. Was greeted pleasantly each morning by cleaning staff. Breakfast was pricey, yet delicious! Drinks in bar were a little too expensive ($16 for vodka/tonic). Great location-central to everything...we walked to fisherman's wharf, union square, Lombard st.-but we like to walk and there were some very steep hills encountered but was nice to see more of the city this way. Staff was friendly!! An aside-dress warm-64 highs in Aug!!!

review.title: Omni hotel in San Francisco
review.reviewText: Good location, quite, professional and helpfully staff

review.title: Wonderful hotel.
review.reviewText: Close to business and tourist areas.  The only downside to staying in downtown San Francisco was the absolutely staggering number of mentally ill/drunk or drug addled homeless men wandering the area.

review.title: Excellent experience with Omni San Francisco Hotel
review.reviewText: The room, service and location of the hotel are excellent.

review.title: Great location.  Friendly staff.
review.reviewText: Great place.  Would highly recommend the Omni.  Great location.  Rooms were modern and clean.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for sharing your experience in our hotel.  We are so appreciative that you chose the Omni.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Thank you.

review.title: Quality hotel, centrally located in financial dist
review.reviewText: Enjoyed this hotel, worried it was slightly out of tourist areas but easy to access them by bus from adjacent street or tram from Market Street. Quality hotel, super friendly staff. Would definitely return.

review.title: Great Hotel location
review.reviewText: Right in the middle of everything, within 1.2 miles to Fisherman's Wharf, couple blocks from China town, 1/2 mile or so to Ferry Building.  Lombard also within walking.  Great location, staff helpful with questions, the nice lady that cleaned our room, everything and everyone was great.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, and the staff was great.
review.negativeRemarks: They charged us to print boarding passes for our flights, most hotels do this free.
review.locationRemarks: Withing a mile you could walk pretty much any sightseeing touristy areas.

review.reviewText: Hotel is actually in a very good location. All staff were quite pleasant and helpful.
review.negativeRemarks: For the rate you are paying, they should have placed bottled water in the guestrooms as a complimentary. Other than that  the hotel is very good

review.title: convenience location.
review.reviewText: Great experience. Friendly staff. We love this place.

I am sorry to hear about the air in your room and apologize for the inconvenience.  We appreciate you letting us know.  We value your feedback and hope to host you again.  Thank you.

review.reviewText: Air conditioning was mediocre to poor.  Otherwise, service was excellent.  Rooms well kept.  Staff very helpful and accommodating.

review.title: Excellent location in San Francisco.
review.reviewText: Financial district is a clean safe area conveniently located within walking distance of China town, north beach and union square.  The trolley runs right in front of hotel.  Checking was smooth.  The room was clean and nicely decorated. Comfortable bed and pillows.  Would definitely stay here again.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and for taking the time to share your feedback.  We are so happy to know that our location was perfect for your visit.  We hope to host you again.  Thank you.

review.title: Weekend getaway
review.reviewText: The hotel staff were very helpful and nice. The hotel was centrally located and we were able to walk to a lot of must see places.

managementResponses.response: Thank you Andy for recognizing the benefits of our location.  We do feel that our location is perfect.  We appreciate you choosing our hotel.  Thank you for sharing your feedback.

review.title: Excellent location
review.reviewText: Great hotel and staff. Location is perfect. Not to far from tourist spots. Not to close for all the noise.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for considering our hotel your perfect home base in San Francisco.  We appreciate your business and hope to host you again. Thank you.

review.title: Good central location for walking to most sites
review.reviewText: Solid hotel with friendly staff.  Lots of good restaurants within walking distance and the concierge was happy to point them out.

managementResponses.response: Thank you Mark for taking the time to share your experience.  We are so happy to hear that our team made a positive impression on your visit to the city.  We value your business and appreciate your feedback.  Thank you.

review.title: Hotel staff extremely friendly and helpful.
review.reviewText: The Hotel was very nice and the staff was friendly and helpful. The maid greeted you in the hall and the bellman was prompt on the door and luggage.  Great experience.
review.locationRemarks: lots of things to do around the hotel with a little walk you were at the Fishermans Wharf. Great location.

managementResponses.response: Thank you Kristi for choosing the Omni San Francisco for your recent vacation.  We appreciate your business and your taking the time to share your feedback.  Our team loves to create memorable experiences for our guests and we are so happy to know that your family enjoyed your visit.  Thank you!

review.title: An Oasis in The Dirty, Noisy, Crowded Storm
review.reviewText: I havent been to San Francisco in 20 years and was so surprised at how it has changed.  Maybe I caught it at a bad time, but the streets were filthy with trash everywhere and the streets so crowded that we walked down towards Fishermens Wharf and just turned back due to the congestion.  Anyway....this hotel in the financial district was our veritable shelter in the storm.  It was quiet, clean and whoever manages the staff must have been trained by a 5 star hotel.  It reminded me of the Ritz Carlton in Maui. Everywhere you go there is a smile and a "do you need anything"? They brought milk and cookies to the room every night for my girls. When I asked about the wifi fee, they comped it. When I struggled with the coffee maker, a new one was sent up immediately.  You are going to pay exorbitant amounts while staying in hotels in the San Fran/Napa/Sonoma area, at least here I got my $ worth.
review.locationRemarks: In Financial District that I liked because it was quiet.
